Translations.Text: Ani tyacya santatila amhi baki rahanari banavile
Ani amhi tyace smarana (carca) nantaracya lokammadhye baki thevale
Nuha (ale.) Vara sarya jagata salama aso
Amhi satkarma karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Nihsansaya, to amacya imana balaganarya dasampaiki hota
Maga itara lokanna amhi budavuna takale
Ani tyacya (nuhacya) mage yenaryampaikica ibrahimahi hote
Jevha te apalya palanakartyajavala sud'dha (nirdosa) antahkaranasaha ale
Te apalya pityasa ani apalya janasamuhacya lokanna mhanale ki tumhi kasaci bhakti aradhana karita ahata
Kaya tumhi allahakherija manane racaleli upasye icchita
Tara maga (sanga ki) tumhi sarva visvancya palanakartyala kaya samajuna ghetale ahe
Ata (ibrahimane) eka najara taryanvara takali
Ani mhanale ki mi tara ajari ahe
Yavara sarvajana tyacyapasuna tonda phiravita parata calale gele
Te (ibrahima) haluca tyancya upasyam (devatam) javala gele ani mhanale, tumhi khata ka nahita
Tumhala jhalam tari kaya ki tumhi bolata sud'dha nahita
Maga tara (purna saktine) ujavya hatane tyanna maranyasa tutuna padale
Te (anekesvaravadi) dhavata palata tyancyakade ale
Tevha te (ibrahima) mhanale ki tumhi asanci puja karata, jyanna tumhi svatah banavita
Vastavika tumhala ani tumhi banavilelya vastunna allahaneca nirmana kele ahe
Te (loka) mhanale, yacyasathi eka ghara (agnikunda) tayara kara ani tya (dhagadhagatya) agita yala takuna dya
Tyanni tara tyacya (ibrahima) si dava kheli icchile, parantu amhi tyannaca tondaghasi padale
Ani (ibrahima) mhanale ki mi tara (hijarata- desatyaga) karuna apalya palanartyakade janara ahe, to niscitaca mala marga dakhavila
He majhya palanakartya! Mala neka sadacari putra pradana kara
Tevha amhi tyala eka sahanasila putra (prapti) ci subhavarta dili

Maga tevha (balaka) ya vayasa pohacale ki tyacyasobata hindu phiru sakela, tevha (ibrahima) mhanale, he majhya priya putra! Mi svapnata svatahla tujhe balidana (kurbani) karatana pahata ahe. Ata tuca sanga, tujha kaya vicara ahe?1 Putrane uttara dile, he pita! Jo adesa (allahatarphe) dila jata ahe, tyace palana kara. Allahane icchile tara mi tumhala dhira-sanyama rakhanaryampaiki adhalela
